originalTitle: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
title: Be Smart, Be Safe! A Big Warning from Home!
content:
Hello there, amazing kids of Africa! It's your friendly reporter, Leo the Lion, bringing you some very important news today. This news is super important because it's about staying safe and smart.

A Big Problem Right Here at Home

Imagine someone you don't know very well comes up to you and offers you lots of sweets, but only if you go with them to a scary, far-off place. Sounds a bit strange, right? Well, something a little like that, but much, much more serious, has been happening in our wonderful country, Kenya. The police, who are our brave protectors, have caught a grown-up person. This grown-up was doing something that was very wrong and very dangerous. This person was asking young men, who are like your big brothers, uncles, or older cousins, to go and fight in a war. Not just any fight, but a real, scary war happening very, very far away from our homes in Africa. The war is between two countries called Russia and Ukraine. These two countries are in a place called Europe, which is a whole continent away! The grown-up was telling these young men to go fight for Russia. This is not good, and it's certainly not safe.

What Exactly is a War?

Did you know? A war is like a huge, terrible fight between two or more countries. Instead of talking about their problems and trying to be friends, they send soldiers to fight each other. It's a very sad and scary thing. In wars, people can get very badly hurt, homes can be destroyed, and families can become very sad. It’s not like a game you play with friends; it’s real and dangerous. Think of it like a very, very angry argument between two big football teams, but with real danger and no fun at all. This specific war, the one between Russia and Ukraine, has been going on for some time. It’s making a lot of people sad all over the world. We in Africa love peace and want everyone to be safe and happy.

Why is This a Big Worry for Us?

The police are very worried because this grown-up person was tricking these young men. "Tricking" means making someone believe something that isn't true, often to make them do something they shouldn't. Maybe they promised them lots of money, or told them they would become heroes, or gave them other fancy ideas. But going to a war is incredibly dangerous. It means leaving your family, your friends, and your safe home to go to a place where there is a lot of noise, danger, and sadness. Imagine being in a place where loud noises happen all the time, and you don't know anyone, and you're far from your mum and dad. That's what it can be like in a war. Our families and our country want our young people to be safe, happy, and strong right here in Africa, not risking their lives in a faraway fight. It's like someone offering you a big piece of cake if you jump into a very deep pool when you can't swim. It sounds good, but it's very risky! Did you know? Staying in your home country and working hard helps your family and your whole country grow stronger and better for everyone!

How Many People Were Asked to Go?

It's being said that a lot of young men were asked to go and fight. People are saying that maybe up to 1,000 young men from Kenya were asked to join this war. Can you imagine 1,000 big brothers, uncles, or older friends leaving their homes and going to a dangerous place? That's a huge number of people! If you think about your school, it might be more than all the children in your school combined! This is why our brave police officers are working so hard. They want to stop this bad thing from happening. They want to protect everyone, especially our young people, from being tricked into doing something so dangerous. They are like very good detectives, trying to find out all the pieces of this puzzle to keep everyone safe.

What Happens Next?

Now that this grown-up has been arrested, they will have to go to a special place called a court. A court is where important grown-ups, like judges, listen very carefully to what happened. They will hear all the facts and decide if the person broke the law. It's a bit like when your teacher finds out someone broke a big school rule, and everyone talks about it to make sure things are fair and right. The police are still doing their work. They are looking for more clues and asking more questions to make sure they understand everything and stop any other people who might be trying to trick young men. We can trust our police to do a good job protecting us. Did you know? The police are like everyday superheroes who wear uniforms and help keep our communities, cities, and countries safe and sound! They work hard so we can play and learn without worry.

Our Super Important Message to YOU!

Dear amazing kids, this news teaches us a very important lesson: always, always talk to a trusted grown-up. This means your fantastic mum, your super dad, your loving grandma or grandpa, your wise teacher, or any other grown-up you trust very much. They are there to help you and keep you safe. If someone you don't know very well, or even someone you do know, offers you something that sounds too good to be true, please tell a trusted grown-up right away! If someone asks you, or your older brother, or an older friend to do something that sounds dangerous, or go to a scary place, tell a grown-up immediately! Your grown-ups are there to protect you, help you make good choices, and keep you out of harm's way. They love you very much and want the best for you. Did you know? Talking to a trusted grown-up when you're worried is one of the smartest things you can do! They have lots of experience and know how to help. Let's all stay safe, stay smart, and always listen to the good advice from the people who love you most. Africa is a beautiful continent filled with wonderful people, and we want everyone to stay safe and happy right here at home, playing, learning, and growing strong together. Thank you for listening, and remember to always be brave and smart!
summary: Police in Kenya have arrested a grown-up who was tricking young men into going to fight in a dangerous war very far away in Ukraine for Russia.
whyMatters: It is very important for everyone, especially young people, to stay safe and not be tricked into dangerous situations like going to war.

originalTitle: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
title: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
content: Violence has plagued South Africa's highly competitive and lucrative taxi industry for decades.

originalTitle: Is Ethiopia heading back to war in Tigray?
title: Helping Friends Find Their Way Home in Ethiopia!
content:
Hello, Amazing Friends!

Welcome to our special news report, live from our big, beautiful continent, Africa! I'm your reporter, Kwesi, and I'm so happy to share stories with you. Today, we're going on a little adventure to a wonderful country called Ethiopia. Ethiopia is a very special place in East Africa, full of tall mountains, ancient stories, and super friendly people! It's famous for its delicious food, like 'injera,' a yummy flatbread. Did you know Ethiopia is one of the oldest countries in the world? How amazing is that!

Meet Tigray, a Special Place in Ethiopia

Inside Ethiopia, there's a big, beautiful area called Tigray. Think of it like a very big neighbourhood or a special part of a country. Tigray has its own unique history, beautiful churches carved out of rocks, and many, many kind families. The people of Tigray are known for their hard work and strong spirits. It's a place where children love to play and learn, just like you!

Why Some Friends are Moving Again

Sometimes, even in the best places, people need to move. Right now, some friends and families in Tigray are packing their bags again. They are moving from their homes to other places. Moving can be a little bit scary, especially when you have to leave your toys, your bed, and your friends behind. They are moving because they want to find places where they feel even safer and can have all the things they need.

Looking for Safe Homes and Happy Schools

Imagine you are playing with your friends, and then you have to move very quickly. Why would you do that? People in Tigray are moving because they want to make sure their children can go to school every day. They want to find yummy food, clean water to drink, and safe places to live. They are looking for a place where everyone can feel happy and healthy. It's all about finding a better chance for a good life, full of learning and laughter.

A Story From Not Long Ago

Just a few years ago, there was a very difficult time in Tigray. It was a time when people were not getting along very well, and it made many families feel sad and worried. It was a big problem, much bigger than a disagreement you might have with a friend. During that time, many people had to leave their homes to find safety. It was a very hard period for everyone.

Did You Know?

Three years might sound like a long time for a grown-up, but for a Class 2 student, it's like counting one, two, three big birthday cakes! It was three birthday cakes ago that the big problem in Tigray started to get better. Everyone hoped that the difficult time would be over for good, and peace would stay forever. And it did get better, for a while!

The Joy of Peace

When the big problem stopped, it was a wonderful time! Peace is like a warm, sunny day after a big, scary storm. When there is peace, children can go to school and learn new things like reading and counting. Families can grow food in their fields and share big meals together. People can play outside without worrying, and everyone can laugh and feel safe. Peace means building new homes, new schools, and making communities strong again. It's the best feeling in the world!

What Does "Moving Again" Mean Now?

Now, some families are moving again. But this time, it's a bit different. It's not the big problem from before coming back. Instead, it's about trying to make life even better after that difficult time. Imagine your house was damaged, and you needed a new one. Or maybe your school needs repairs, so you go to another school for a while. Families in Tigray are moving to find places where they can get more help, find better jobs, and make sure their children have everything they need to grow up strong and healthy. They are looking for good chances and new beginnings.

Helpers All Around the World!

Don't worry, many kind people are helping our friends in Tigray! There are brave helpers, sometimes called aid workers, who bring yummy food, clean water, and warm blankets. They are like superheroes, making sure people have what they need to live. Governments and big organizations from all over the world are also working together. They are helping to build new homes, fix schools, and make sure everyone in Tigray can live safely and happily. It's a big team effort to make things better!

Did You Know?

When many people work together, even very big problems can be solved! It's like when you and your classmates work together on a big project or play a team sport. Everyone's help makes a big difference. The people of Africa, and many friends around the world, care deeply about the children and families in Tigray.

Hopes for Happy Futures

We wish all our friends in Tigray will soon find their safe and happy homes. We hope that all the children can go back to school every single day, play with their friends, and learn amazing things. We want them to dream big dreams for their future! Africa is a continent full of hope, strength, and love. We believe that the brave people of Ethiopia will continue to work hard for peace and happiness. Let's send them all our good wishes and hope for lots of sunshine, laughter, and bright futures!
summary: Some families in Tigray, Ethiopia, are moving again to find safer homes, better food, and good schools, and many people are working together to help them after a difficult time a few years ago.
whyMatters: It's important because every child and family deserves a safe home, yummy food, clean water, and a chance to learn and play without worry, so they can grow up happy and strong.

title: US-Iran talks conclude with claims of progress but few details

content: The issue of Greenland, which Donald Trump wants to annex, is likely to dominate the election campaign.

originalTitle: A 'normal guy' doing 'brilliant' things - Lammens on life at Man Utd
title: Senne, The Super Goalkeeper Who Inspires Us All!
content:
Hello, Friends! Let's Talk Football!

Welcome, amazing kids, to your special news from Africa! Today, we have a super exciting story about a football player who is doing wonderful things. His name is Senne Lammens, and he plays for a very, very famous football team called Manchester United. Imagine playing for a team that people all over the world know and cheer for! That's Senne! Senne is a kind of football player called a goalkeeper. He says he is "just a normal guy." But everyone sees how great he is at playing football. His friends, his coaches, and all the fans are seeing how brilliant he is on the field. He is making everyone super proud!

What Does a Goalkeeper Do? It's a Super Important Job!

Do you know what a goalkeeper does? It's one of the most exciting jobs on the football pitch! The goalkeeper's job is to protect the goal. The goal is the big net at each end of the field. The other team tries to kick the ball into this net to score a point, called a "goal." Senne, the goalkeeper, has to stop them! He jumps, he dives, he catches the ball with his hands. He needs to be very fast and very brave. Think of him like a superhero guarding his castle! He is the last line of defence for his team. Without a good goalkeeper, it would be much easier for the other team to score goals. Did you know? Goalkeepers wear special, big gloves! These gloves help them catch the very fast football without hurting their hands. They are like a superhero's shield for their hands, making sure the ball doesn't slip away!

Playing for a Big Team: Manchester United!

Senne plays for Manchester United. This is not just any team; it's one of the biggest and most famous football clubs in the whole world! They play in red shirts and have millions of fans who love watching them. These fans are people who cheer for the team very loudly, wishing them to win. Imagine playing with your friends, and then imagine playing with thousands of people watching you, cheering your name! That's what it's like for Senne. When you wear the Manchester United red shirt, it means you are a very special player. It means you are part of a team with a long history of great players and amazing games. Did you know? Many amazing football players from Africa play for big teams all around the world! They started just like you, playing with friends and dreaming big. They show that if you work hard, you can reach the stars!

Senne's First Time Playing! (His "Debut Season")

This year is Senne's "debut season." What does that mean? It means it is his very first time playing for the big Manchester United team! He just started playing with them, and he is already doing so well. It's like starting a new school or a new game, and right away, everyone sees you are super good at it! Starting something new can sometimes be a little bit scary, but Senne is showing everyone how brave and talented he is. He is making amazing saves, stopping the ball from going into the net again and again. Every time he does something brilliant, the fans cheer even louder! This is a very exciting time for Senne and for his team.

Senne is a "Normal Guy" Like You and Me!

Even though Senne is a famous football player, he says he is "just a normal guy." What does that mean? It means that even though he plays for a big team, he is still humble and kind. He works hard, he listens to his coaches, and he plays fair with his teammates. He knows that working together as a team is super important. Being a "normal guy" means he might like to laugh, play, and spend time with his friends and family, just like you! It shows that you don't have to be loud or show-off to be great. You can be a kind, everyday person and still do amazing things. This is a very good lesson for all of us. Did you know? Being a good teammate is just as important as being good at kicking the ball! A team works best when everyone helps each other and celebrates together.

Why Senne is a Super Star! (His "Growing Reputation")

Senne's "reputation is growing." This means that more and more people are hearing about how good he is. They are talking about his amazing saves and how he helps his team win games. When people talk about you and say good things, your reputation grows bigger and bigger! It means people admire what you do. He has made some incredible stops this season, where it looked like the other team was sure to score, but Senne, with his quick hands and brave heart, stopped the ball! These moments make the fans leap out of their seats and cheer. His excellent playing makes his team stronger and gives them a better chance to win trophies. That's why he is becoming a star!

Playing at Old Trafford – A Big Home!

Manchester United plays their home games at a very special place called Old Trafford. It is a very, very big stadium! Imagine a huge building where thousands and thousands of people can sit and watch a football game. The fans sing songs and wave flags, making it a super exciting place to be. When Senne plays at Old Trafford, he plays in front of all these cheering fans. It must feel like magic! This stadium is like the team's home, their special place where they feel strong and loved. It's a place where dreams come true for many football players. Playing there means you are truly a part of something big. Did you know? A football stadium is like a big theatre for sports! It's built for many people to come together and watch their favorite teams play. The cheers make a lot of noise!

Dreams Can Come True! Just Like Senne's!

Senne's story teaches us that if you have a dream and work hard, you can achieve it. He worked hard to become a good goalkeeper, and now he is playing for one of the biggest teams in the world! This is a wonderful message for all kids, especially those of you who love playing football in your villages or schools across Africa. If you love football, keep practicing! Kick the ball with your friends, run fast, and have fun. Who knows, maybe one day you could also be a famous football player, making amazing saves or scoring brilliant goals for a big team. Your dream might just be waiting for you!

Keep Playing, Keep Dreaming!

So, remember Senne Lammens, the "normal guy" who is doing such brilliant things. Let his story inspire you to work hard, be kind, and never stop dreaming. Keep playing football, keep having fun, and maybe one day, we will be reporting about your amazing football adventures too! Go for it, future football stars!
summary: Senne Lammens is a new goalkeeper for the famous Manchester United team, who is doing amazing things in his first season and inspires kids to work hard and dream big.
whyMatters: Senne's story shows that even a 'normal guy' can achieve big dreams like playing for a famous football team if he works hard and is good at what he does, inspiring kids everywhere to follow their passions.

content: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Oli Fox from indie band Good Neighbours, plus the BBC readers and AI with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.

title: How have Chelsea made biggest loss in English football history?
